name: OpenTeQ
description: OpenTeQ is a professional IT services firm with global reach, and deep expertise in offering IT Consulting, Technology solutions and Digital transformation. As a software and system integration company, we feature a variety of IT services to meet the technological needs of our customers. Services we offer include application development and integration, business processes services, engineering services, quality assurance & testing, digital engagement, data & analytics, and cloud-enabled IT operations. OpenTeQ – Your trusted IT partner, can help you with Digital transformation.
features: OpenTeQ is driven by client centric approach. We are client-focused and exhibit client centricity in our processes, behavior, and attitude
solving problems while providing the most efficient and cost saving solutions possible
We are helping business globally and focused with presence in USA, Canada, and India.
Headline: NetSuite Solutions Provider & BPO Accounting Partner | NetSuite Consulting, Integrations, Accounting & Support
ShortDescription: OpenTeQ is a professional IT services firm with global reach, and deep expertise in offering IT Consulting, Technology solutions and Digital transformation.
enhanced_description: OpenTeQ is a professional IT services firm specializing in digital transformation and technology solutions, with a strong focus on HR technology. As a software and system integration company, OpenTeQ offers a variety of IT services including application development and integration, business process services, engineering services, quality assurance & testing, digital engagement, data & analytics, and cloud-enabled IT operations. Within the HR domain, OpenTeQ provides solutions particularly in Total Rewards and Benefits Administration software, leveraging its expertise as a NetSuite Solutions Provider for consulting, integrations, accounting, and support. OpenTeQ aims to help businesses globally improve employee happiness, engagement, satisfaction, and recognition, while providing efficient and cost-saving solutions through its client-centric approach.
key_use_cases: System and application integration for HR platforms
IT consulting for HR technology solutions
Improving employee happiness and engagement programs
Implementing and supporting NetSuite for HR-related financial and operational processes
Custom application development for HR needs
competitive_advantages: Client-centric approach in processes, behavior, and attitude
Focus on providing efficient and cost-saving solutions
Global reach with presence in USA, Canada, and India
Deep expertise as a NetSuite Solutions Provider
